data.name: AcceptInvitePrompt
data.value: Enter the roundup invite code you were sent, or paste the entire invite message into the box below:

data.name: BadInviteCode
data.value:
The invite code you provided doesn't seem to be correct.
If you received the invite via SMS or email you can copy the entire message into the invite code box.

data.name: CannotChangeRoundUpPoint
data.value:
Unable to change the meetup location with the roundup cloud service.
Try again later.

data.name: CannotStartInviteeSession
data.value:
Unable to start a new invitee session with the roundup cloud service.
Try again later.

data.name: CannotStartNewSession
data.value:
Unable to start a new session with the roundup cloud service.
Try again later.

data.name: ChangeRoundUpPointSuccess
data.value:
The roundup location has been successfully changed.
All invitees have been sent update notifications.

data.name: InviteMessage
data.value: You have been invited to meetup with {alias}. Tap the link to open the roundup app (or, open roundup and paste this msg into the accept invite box).

data.name: MissingInviteCode
data.value:
You must provide the invite code that was sent to you by the person inviting you to meetup.
If you received the invite via SMS or email you can copy the entire message into the invite code box.

data.name: MissingMapAuthenticationCode
data.value:
Unable to get the authentication required to use mapping.
Close the app (by tapping the back button on your device) and try agin later.

data.name: NewSessionSuccess
data.value:
A new roundup session and invite code has been created.
You can share the invite code friends who have roundup.
Anybody you invite to join you will be able to see your location until the session ends or is cancelled.

data.name: NoStartNewSessionNoLocation
data.value:
Your current location is unknown. Update your location and try again.
To update your location, click the 'location' update button, or select the 'update location' menu item.
The GPS sensors in your device may not work correctly if you are indoors, or there are a lot a high buildings nearby.

data.name: RequestPermissionLocationServices
data.value:
Do you give permission for roundup to use location services on this device?
Background location tracking and the ability to run while the lock screen is engaged are turned on by default.
All location service features may be disabled or enabled at any time from the 'settings' screen.
This app's use of your location is described in the app's Full Privacy Policy (see the 'about' screen).

data.name: SessionDoesNotExist
data.value:
The requested roundup session does not exist.
The session may have expired or been cancelled, or you may have entered the wrong invite code.
Check the code and try again.

data.name: SessionIsNotAlive
data.value:
The requested roundup session is not active.
The session may have expired or been cancelled, or you may have entered the wrong invite code.
Check the code and try again.

data.name: SetNewRoundUpPointPrompt
data.value:
Click OK, then tap anywhere on the map to set a new roundup point.
Alternatively, click cancel to use your current location as the roundup point.

data.name: SettingsPane_AliasTitle
data.value: Your name/alias. Used in notifications and as part of any roundup invite. You don't need to provide your real name (this app does not send any information that personally identifies you or your device to third parties).

data.name: SettingsPane_AlwaysShowsDirections
data.value: Always show directions to the roundup location.

data.name: SettingsPane_LocationServicesOnOff
data.value:
Turn location services on or off. If you turn this feature off, the app will not be able to operate.
This app's use of location services is described in the Full Privacy Policy (see the 'about' screen).

data.name: SettingsPane_LocationTrackingOnOff
data.value: Turn location tracking on or off. If you turn this feature off, the app will not be able to operate.

data.name: WantToAcceptInvite
data.value: Want to accept an invite from

data.name: SettingsPane_BackgroundExecution
data.value: Allow the app to run in the background and track location. This is optional (it isn't a requirement for correct operation).

data.name: SettingsPane_RunUnderLockScreen
data.value: Allow the app to run when the lock screen is engaged. This is optional (it isn't a requirement for correct operation).

data.name: CannotGetRoute
data.value:
Sorry, unable to get the route to the roundup point.
However, {0} is located at {1}.
This location is marked on the map and is {2} away from your current location.

data.name: NoNetworkConnection
data.value:
You are not currently connected to the network.
Try again later.

data.name: UnableToRestorePreviousSession
data.value:
Unable to restore previous session.
Create a new session and invite others to join you.

data.name: SettingsPane_SessionDeadTimeout
data.value: When restarting the app, if a time period greater than the following value has elapsed, no attempt will be made to restore the previous session.

data.name: AlreadyPurchased
data.value:
You have a FULL license to use roundup. This entitles you to free updates to this version.
Thank you very much for your support, it's much appreciated!

data.name: TrialHasExpired
data.value:
The trial period for this app has expired.
You must now either purchase roundup from the store, or uninstall it.

data.name: PrivacyPolicy_Content
data.value:
For your privacy and security:
We do NOT store or transmit any information that uniquely identifies you.
We do NOT access personal information (like your name, or any Microsoft account details).
We do NOT store any information (either on the phone or in our cloud-based service) that could be used by unauthorized third-parties to track your location, gain access to personal data, or identify you or your phone.
The user may disable or enable location (including background location tracking) and notification services at any time from the 'settings' screen.
Information related to a completed or cancelled session is deleted from the RoundUp cloud service database within 24 hours. Any session that remains incomplete after a 24-hour period will automatically be terminated and all data removed.
We do require a data connection to exchange location information with the RoundUp cloud service and the Microsoft Push Notification Service.
Please refer to to the Full Privacy Policy for a detailed discussion of how this app makes use of location services and push notifications, as well as details of data stored by the RoundUp cloud service.
Usage terms and conditions:
The roundup app is appropriate only for non-critical location tracking scenarios. Specifically, roundup should not be used as part of safety- or mission-critical operations.
The app is available free-of-charge as a fully-functional, 14-day trial. You are strongly encouraged to try the app before you purchase in order to test operation with your specific device and in your geographic location.
Please review the full terms and conditions of use for roundup (see the link at the botton of this screen).

data.name: PurchaseReminder
data.value:
You are running the trial version of this app.
The trial period will expire in {0} days, after which you must either purchase or uninstall the app.

data.name: AcceptInviteSuccess
data.value:
Your are now connected to {0}.
They will be able to see your location until the session ends (when you arrive), or you cancel.

data.name: RequestPermissionMpns
data.value:
Do you give permission for roundup to use notifications sent by the Microsoft push notification system?
Notifications contain data related to your location, and are described in the app's Full Privacy Policy (see the 'about' screen).
Notifications may be turned on/off in the 'settings' screen.

data.name: SettingsPane_MpnsOnOff
data.value:
Turn push notifications on or off. If you turn this feature off, the app will not be able to operate.
This app's use of push notifications is described in the Full Privacy Policy (see the 'about' screen)

data.name: CancelInviteeSession
data.value:
Cancel your participation in the current roundup session.
Are you sure?

data.name: CancelInviterSession
data.value:
Cancel the current roundup session?
If you do this a notification will be sent to all invitees, cancelling their participation in the session.
Are you sure?

data.name: CannotCancelSession
data.value: There was an error cancelling the session. Some invitees may not have received a notification.

data.name: SessionHasBeenCancelled
data.value: The session has been successfully cancelled.

data.name: AllInviteesHaveCancelled
data.value:
All invitees have cancelled their participation in the roundup session.
Do you want to end the session now?

data.name: InviteeHasCancelledToast
data.value: has cancelled their participation in this roundup session.

data.name: SessionHasBeenCancelledByInviter
data.value: has cancelled the current roundup session - sorry!

data.name: MpnsLimitExceeded
data.value:
The Microsoft push notification system has indicated that this app has received too many notifications within a 24-period.
Try the operation again later.

data.name: TooManyInvitees
data.value: Sorry, the maximum number of invitees permitted on a session has been reached.

data.name: MpnsTimedOut
data.value:
Unable to complete the operation. The Microsoft push notification service is not responding.
Try the operation again later.

data.name: MpnsChannelError_ChannelOpenFailed
data.value:
Channel open failed.
This error was issued by the Microsoft push notification service. It indicates that the device could not be connected to the notification service.
This error can be caused if the phone's date and time is not correctly set.
It is recommended that you quit (by using the back button on the device) and then re-open the app.
If you continue to get this error you may wish to review the roundup support page (see the link in the 'about' screen), which has specific advice on this error

data.name: MpnsChannelError_NotificationRateTooHigh
data.value:
Notification rate is too high.
This error was issued by the Microsoft push notification service. It indicates that our roundup cloud service is requesting too many notifications be sent to this app.
It is recommended that you quit (by using the back button on the device) and then re-open the app.
If you continue to get this error you may wish to review the roundup support page (see the link in the 'about' screen), which has specific advice on this error

data.name: MpnsChannelError_PowerLevelChanged
data.value:
Power level too low.
This error was issued by the Microsoft push notification service. It indicates that the power-level has dropped too low for the notification service to be used.
It is recommended that you quit (by using the back button on the device), connect the device to a power source, and then re-open the app.
If you continue to get this error you may wish to review the roundup support page (see the link in the 'about' screen), which has specific advice on this error

data.name: MpnsChannelError_Unknown
data.value:
General failure.
This error was issued by the Microsoft push notification service. It indicates that an unknown or notification formatting-related problem has been encountered.
It is recommended that you quit (by using the back button on the device) and then re-open the app.
If you continue to get this error you may wish to review the roundup support page (see the link in the 'about' screen), which has specific advice on this error

data.name: HelpText02
data.value: Tell your friends you want to meet up.

data.name: HelpText03
data.value: See your friends on the map.

data.name: HelpText04
data.value: Got an invite? Just tap the link.

data.name: TileNoSessionWideMsg
data.value: Start a new roundup session and invite your friends to join you

data.name: LongJourney
data.value:
You are attempting to use roundup for a long journey of {0} km.
Too avoid sending a large number of push notifications, progress updates will only be broadcast to the person who invited you every {1} km.

data.name: CancelUnstartedSession
data.value:
Cancel the current roundup session?
We are currently waiting for a push notification containing the session ID (the session has not finished the start-up process).
Are you sure?

data.name: NoInviteCode
data.value:
Sorry, the roundup cloud service has not yet delivered the necessary invite code to us.
Try again later.

data.name: KeyServicesAreOff
data.value:
Unable to proceed with operation because the key services listed below are turned off.
You may turn these services on from the 'settings' screen.

data.name: LocationServicesDisabled
data.value:
Location services have been disabled.
You may turn location services on from the 'settings' screen.

data.name: SettingsPane_ToastOnOff
data.value:
Allow toast notifications when the app is running in the background.
These notifcations tell you when somebody has joined a roundup session, you've arrived, etc.

data.name: CannotGetLocation
data.value:
We can't get your location right now, but we'll keep trying in the background.
The GPS sensors in your device may not work correctly if you are indoors, or there are a lot a high buildings nearby.

data.name: BingMapsPostamble
data.value: For an even better experience, get roundup from the Windows Phone Store:

data.name: BingMapsPreamble
data.value: {alias} is sharing a location with you with via roundup and Bing maps:

data.name: ShareTargetHasRoundUp
data.value: the person I'm sharing with has roundup

data.name: BingMapsViaClipboard
data.value:
A link which can show your current location using Bing Maps has been added to the clipboard.
You can send this link to a friend so they can view your current location using any device that can access the web.

data.name: BingMapsViaEmail
data.value:
An email message which includes a link to show your current location using Bing Maps has been created.
You can send this link to a friend so they can view your current location using any device that can access the web.
Click OK to view the message in the email composer and select the person(s) you wish to send it to.

data.name: BingMapsViaSms
data.value:
An SMS message which includes a link to show your current location using Bing Maps has been created.
You can send this link to a friend so they can view your current location using any device that can access the web.
Click OK to view the message in the SMS message composer and select the person(s) you wish to send it to.

data.name: ShareViaClipboard
data.value:
A roundup invite code has been added to the clipboard.
You can send this code to friends that have roundup. Once they accept your invite you'll be able to see them on the map, and they'll be able to see your location on their map.

data.name: NoDirections
data.value: There are no route directions to view.

data.name: NoInvitees
data.value: No invitees have accepted your invitation.

data.name: CantCreateNewSessionWhenInvitee
data.value:
You can't create a new session because you are already an invitee in an existing roundup session.
You may share your location using Bing maps via SMS or email while you are participating in a roundup session.
Alternatively, cancel your participation in the current session, then create a new session.

data.name: RateAppReminder
data.value:
You've been using roundup for a while now. We really hope you're finding it useful.
We'd love it if you'd give us a rating in the store. This will help spread the word about roundup, and your feedback will help us make things even better in future versions!
Click 'ok' to rate this app in the store, or click 'cancel' to continue using roundup.
You will not be reminded again to rate this app - we'd hate to nag!!
